oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Longitudinal Study to Describe the Presence of Escherichia coli 0157:H7 and Salmonella spp in Feedlot Cattle Pens
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smith, D. R.
Moxley, R. A.
Hinkley, S.
Klopfenstein, T. J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Escherichia coli
Salmonella spp
feedlot cattle
feeding period
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to use a novel diagnostic strategy to describe the presence of Escherichia coli O157:H7 and Salmonella spp in pens of feedlot cattle over the course of the feeding period.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2002; 169
